rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An airy living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall to allow abundant natural light. The room is oriented with a view that encourages energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for easy access, featuring a Vastu-compliant layout ensuring proper balance and harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with ample storage and work area. Placed in the southeast corner to align with water elements according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom for guests located near the living room area ensuring convenience without compromising privacy.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small storage space for cleaning supplies and appliances, placed discreetly away from main circulation areas per local building norms.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office with north-east orientation to promote productivity and positive energy. Designed with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light, while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A private gym space located in the southwest section of the ground floor, promoting balance and energy according to Vastu principles.
